argument.name: win_accounts
argument.description: A collection containing information about the memory configuration of a computer.

argument.name: computer
argument.description: Optional. Default = "." (local computer). The name of the computer to analyze.

page.description: Retrieve information about Windows user and group accounts
page.discussion: The WIN_ACCOUNTS() function retrieves information about Windows user and group accounts.
page.example:
x = win_accounts() ? x.enum_all() = DAVID\Everyone DAVID\Administrator DAVID\Guest DAVID\HelpAssistant DAVID\IUSR_DAVID DAVID\IWAM_DAVID DAVID\test ...
? x.get("DAVID\test") = AccountType = 512 Caption = "DAVID\test" Description = "local non-admin account" Disabled = .F. Domain = "DAVID" FullName = "David Bell" InstallDate = "" LocalAccount = "T" Lockout = .F. Name = "test" PasswordChangeable = .T. PasswordExpires = .F. PasswordRequired = .T. SID = "S-1-5-21-2081314955-4247850554-408701278-1009" SIDType = "1" Status = "OK"
page.limitations: This function does not work with Windows 98 and Windows ME.
